query:
mutation addActionContact(
  $action: ActionInput!,
  $contact:ContactInput!,
  $privacy:ConsentInput!,
  $contactRef:ID,
  $actionPage:Int!,
  $tracking:TrackingInput
){
  addActionContact(
    actionPageId: $actionPage, 
    action: $action,
    contactRef:$contactRef,
    contact:$contact,
    privacy:$privacy,
    tracking:$tracking
  ){contactRef,firstName}
  }
